website_summaries.verdict: This red dot laser combo sight stands out for its tool-free adjustment and its variety of settings.
pros: Red dot, laser combo can be run together or separately
Easy to zero in with just your fingers
cons: Impact and recoil can shut this sight off too easily
Some had problems zeroing this sight in due to faulty sight adjustments

customer_reviews.title: I would like eithe Amazon or the vendor to fix this as ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this over two months ago and finally sighted it in yesterday. 54 rounds and I had both laser and red dot dialed in. FROM THEN ON every shot would turn off the laser, or the red dot, or BOTH! After over 70+ rounds I could not turn it back on! I would like eithe Amazon or the vendor to fix this as I LOVE this sight combination! When it worked it was Fantastic!! ED Walters
customer_reviews.author: Pai Hu Hsin

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: You would think it’s sturdy, one range visit later.. 350 round after the red dot turned off by itself.. every time you charge the bcg or release the bolt any type of hard impact it turns off... same goes for laser.. I’m very disappointed.. I wouldn’t trust this in a life or death scenario
customer_reviews.author: raul

customer_reviews.title: Sights adjustment does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Sight adjustment does not work for the red dot. Holding good groups but they are 6” low and right and will not move. Lol. Missed the deadline for return so my loss. Highly recommend looking for a different optic of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: RP36

customer_reviews.title: Knobs are terrible ie. up is down right is left
customer_reviews.text: Knobs are terrible ie. up is down right is left. Really frustrating to site with that. Also unless you want to use superglue on the threads this site does not stay tight to rail.
customer_reviews.author: TandA

customer_reviews.title: Returned this product and went with a Vortex Scope.
customer_reviews.text: This site was bottomed out and was still shooting 6" high. I spent $50 more on a Vortex Strikefire and it's prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Super Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great first impressions with build quality. Nailing quarter sized targets at 50 yards. Dot is small and crisp. Glass is very clear with a blue hue. Riser clears the A2 front post. Will recommend! Great addition to my Smith and Wesson M&P15. *UPDATE* 3/12/19 After countless range sessions the laser finally decided to go out. I do shoot in the rain. Other then that, been exactly how it was months ago. Great sight.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wong

customer_reviews.title: AT3 red dot sight with lazer awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Two moa red dot for my carbine 9mm is perfect at 100 yards held zero and lazer blew me away accurate at 50 yards!
customer_reviews.author: Nice guy

customer_reviews.title: Scope
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a beautiful scope, and it has great features But it does not fit in the parameters in which I thought. I had return the scope I’m sorry to say but I did replace it with the sitemark Ultra. SM26008 I’m hoping I have better luck with this one Sincerely William J Rabar Jr
customer_reviews.author: William j Rabar jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent red dot/laser combo.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent red dot/laser combo. Wish laser w/e setscrews had a cover as there is for the red dot setscrews however. Clear image. Easy zeroing. Holds zero well on my AR. (I have bought some Permatex black gasket material and made my own w/e screw covers. Can be a bit messy to make if you're not real careful but seals the screws from the weather, and can be replaced/repaired/removed easily as needed)
customer_reviews.author: Dr. RM

customer_reviews.title: Great optic for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this optic. When comparing this to similar products I believe the quality of this optic compares very well and is less expensive. The laser is an added bonus and functions very well. This is a great optic for quick target acquisition and is a great improvement to the Magpul flip sight and front iron combo I was previously using (Note: I was able to mount this right in front of the rear flip sight and field of view is great. It is also tall enough that the red dot hovers above the front iron sight and is not obstructed in anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Cant Complain
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Holds fine on 223 and 300blk, laser holds fine too. Wish the laser was green but that's just personal preference. All ajustments are thick flat head so no carrying a random allen key and can be changed with a coin, key, ect in a pinch. Flip up caps are snug. Uses one CR123a battery for both laser and dot which is great. Battery life seems fine with no off drain. Not real picky for red dot clarity, seems decent though. Id say the $100 price tag is pretty fair for this red dot laser combo.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great optic
customer_reviews.text: I have several high end reflex sights and the AT3 is on par with them. It sighted in very easy and ran flawlessly after 500 continuous rounds. This optic is well under valued and worth the purchase. I have now put 3000 rounds down range and the laser and optic still holding zero. Last range visit the optic turned off a few times. I tightened the battery cover and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Toney M.

customer_reviews.title: Designed to fail due to battery disconnection on recoil...
customer_reviews.text: Red dot and laser did not survive 600 rounds of 223/556 ammo. The 123A battery is alligned with recoil forces and failed to maintain contact before 600 rounds had passed. I am now seeing the wisdom of button cell batteries such as the CR2032 because they are always alligned in a way that maintains contact in spite of recoil forces. I will never buy another cylindrical battery optic again. Cylindrical batteries slide fore and aft with every shot and springs wear out and fail to maintain contact. LED and laser lights turn off when that circuit opens from recoil.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on an AR15, other reviews were mixed as I'm sure everyone had differing opinions of what they want in a product. I read enough good things to justify try this red dot for my build and so far I'm glad I did. I sighte in the red dot and the laser, both have proven (over about a dozen trips to the range) to hold zero, and I have not experienced any issues with the battery. For the money I am a happy camper and plan on trying a green laser on my next build.
customer_reviews.author: todd a morrow

customer_reviews.title: It works well, great customer support
customer_reviews.text: The first unit I got was having issues of turn it self off from the vibration/shock of my AR in 9mm. Not all the time just at random. I contacted AT3 and they admitted there were some unit out there with the issue. They sent me a replacement unit right away without asking for any additional funds and was trusting that would send the defective back. I got the replacement unit and fired 200 round with no issues. I shoot USPSA matches, not well, but having fun. This is great red dot/laser unit. If you do have problem contact AT3 right away. Their customer service is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: L W.

customer_reviews.title: Great optic for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s be honest. The laser is kind of a novalty unless you do a lot of hip firing but it’s a nice touch and may prove to be useful as a deterrent if nothing else. It’s true, the adjusters are backwards as another customer stated but who cares. Took me two clicks to figure that out. If you want a great combo sight with out breaking the bank, there is no other choice... Very high quality for the money. Lifetime transferable warranty too!
customer_reviews.author: TheCottonTop

customer_reviews.title: nice enough
customer_reviews.text: I spent some time with the sight, learning how it works. With a red dot sight on another weapon, I knew my way around it intuitively. The instructions are adequate and can be supplemented with a YouTube, and there is no mention of the kind of battery you need (which I like to keep on hand). The workmanship was good, and the sight did not need massive recalibration to remove and reinstall. But that would be recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Sighted in on my rifle and tested at the range. So far both the red dot and the laser are holding their adjustments firmly. Will change my rating if that changes. Only been able to test and a 40 ft pistol range so far but plan to visit a rifle range soon, put more rounds through it and see how the device holds up. Put about 100 rounds through it so far and super accurate at 40 ft but that is not much of a test for a 9mm carbine with a 16 inch barrel. Anxious to test at 50 and 100 yards to see how it does.
customer_reviews.author: Wrenchbender13

customer_reviews.title: Good sight for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pros: one piece construction, good glass, bright crisp laser and red dot, comes with lens covers, adjustment covers have o-ring seals and Also work as the adjustment tool Cons: easy to work loose on rail (check often) especially when first sighting in, no covers for the laser adjustments also laser adjustments don’t have any detents and seem to turn kinda easy, could possibly get moved during transporting, lens cover hinge pin tried to work it’s way out it’s just pushed into place Overall: a good sight for the money, held zero (when not loose) appears to be of rugged construction I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AT3 has stellar customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This company is just simply amazing. For the price point of this optic you really get a lot of bang for your buck. Holds zero, good design! Most importantly I had a minor issue and AT3 shipped me a new optic immediately with a return envelope for the defective sight! Best online experience I’ve ever had! Thanks guys
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Really liked the Red Dot sight
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the Red Dot sight. I took it to the range and dialed it it at 50 yards. It was easy to get it set up and I was even able to hit a 400 yard steel target half the time after sighting it in. The laser is another story. I could bore sight it ok in my garage but on the range you can't see it at all. I'll just keep messing with it to see if I'm doing something wrong. Scope is great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be a nice Red Dot, though I haven't had a chance to sight it in yet. The shipping was fast and a nice touch by AT3 to include the sighting in targets via separate email; they seem to be very eager to please and I have no doubt that they will respond quickly if there are any problems with the product. The unit has a good feature set, a bright red dot and appears to be quality made; time will tell when I get out and shoot with it. Very pleased with the function, fit, finish and price point so far!
customer_reviews.author: N. Leann Janson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good device
customer_reviews.text: I guess you pay for what you get. Optic in general are expensive. I wish this unit was a little cheaper. The LED beam is very bright. Out of the box it seemed to be very accurate. You can customize the optic and laser for this unit. Over all I can not complain and it looks really good on my AR.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Great sight!
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these sights for my M&P 15-22s and they are a good value for the money. The Red Dot is very clear and precise which greatly helps for accurate shooting. The laser is easy to dial in after the Red Dot is set. I like the way the Red Dot brightness setting stays the same when the sight is turned off and then back on.
customer_reviews.author: LeCygneLady

customer_reviews.title: best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: a high quality red dot sight with built in laser and digital controls under $120. why are you wasting time reading these reviews? buy this now before its sold out. it has a built it riser for perfect co sighting and even the box is higher quality than the sights normally in this price range. look for the video of people beating this sight up and then immeadiatly using it without it losing its accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Plague vendor

customer_reviews.title: Quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Super nice , great quality ,unbelievably good customer service , well built fits my AR perfectly makes it look super slick now I want to save up my money to get the RRDM 3X Red Dot Magnifier with the way it's built I have confidence that it will be good no matter what quality is apparently there number one focus .
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Optic only lasted 6 months before failing. Will not cut off when power button is held nor will it adjust on windage now. Zero won't stay set at all. Cuts off randomly after firing shoots down range. Completely disappointed with this optic. Oh, and Amazon says my return is not available. Over $100 wasted on a poorly made product. Biggest factor is I can't even get it replaced at least.
customer_reviews.author: kraig tatum

customer_reviews.title: Very good optic for any gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good optic for any gun that has the Picatinny rail system. It was very easy to sight in using the recommended bore sighting tool. The only negative I found was that it only has a red-dot and no other symbols like a cross or diamond. Other than that it works good and looks great on my AR-15!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pigg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I put the a T3 tactical site and 3X magnifier on my AR and it is without question the best red dot I have ever used and is very fast and accurate. I have recommended a T3 tactical to half a dozen friends three of which I know have purchased this red dot sight or combo.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, competitively priced for great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it is incredibly well designed, comes with a very easy to read and follow set of instructions, and very quick to set up. What really stands this product out from its competitors is the value, the price point is aggressively priced which makes it very affordable and well worth it given what you are paying for. My only critique is during my first time with the product in the range, the laser pointer seemed to become misaligned after putting about 40 to 60 rounds out. I’m not sure Y that was the case, but it took only a second to realign.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ishu

customer_reviews.title: Red dot and laser goes out after firing
customer_reviews.text: I took this bad boy out to zero and no shizzz first shot the red dot and laser went out. I had to smack on it with my hand and BOOM it showed up again. Over the course of 80 rounds it kept going out. I had a 556 ar. I asked my range guy to tell me what I am doing wrong and he advised that this type of optic belongs on an air soft LOL. I would not recommend for an AR.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice red dot. Compact with a very clear dot. Laser is a bonus and is extremely bright and easy to spot even in mid day sun. I’m very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: best reddot laser sight for your needs.
customer_reviews.text: I have this red dot and laser sight on my crossbow set up for alligator hunting and it was easy to sight in which took 2 shots to do. And the laser is a night time only thing which is all i aim with at night. I been through a rainstorm and it held up great. It is so nice one of my friends are ordering it for his crossbow as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved my shooting immensely
customer_reviews.text: Went to 25-yard indoor range to adjust and once it was adjusted, I could not hit anything outside the 9 ring, even in a standing off-hand stance. Next stop is the 100-yard range where I am confident of the same results. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: So far I am pleased with the AT3 LEOS
customer_reviews.text: So far I am pleased with the AT3 LEOS. I have only used it a handful of times on a CZ Scorpion. There have been times while I'm out shooting that the red dot has turned off after pulling the trigger. My assumption is that the recoil is causing the battery to lose contact, I am sure the laser would have the same result as it is the same battery.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Did not set the bill.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this but had to return it because once I received that it looked like it was used already. I'm sure it's not Amazon's fault maybe somebody else returned it who knows.
customer_reviews.author: richiet9

customer_reviews.title: but it's a great fit with good features and view even from a ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't made it to the range yet, but it's a great fit with good features and view even from a second story. The seller provided some great info to zero the sight to the Smith and Wesson M&P sport I bought it for....Great addition for my first Ar rifle...must buy
customer_reviews.author: Rico4USA

customer_reviews.title: Great, until the second time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to mount, sight-in and use, with tight groups at 100 yds. (Adjustment screws were tightened down) Next time I take it out, the group has shifted THREE FEET to the left!

customer_reviews.title: Has annoying red reflection in the viewer
customer_reviews.text: I sent my first one back only to find that its an inherrent flaw. The red reflection that covers half the view is very slight but just annoying. The rest of the product is excellent and worth dealing with the flaw. For the price, its a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Tac medic

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The AT3 Tactical mounts and dismounts in seconds. It holds well throughout target shooting with just the occasional slight tightening of the thumb screw. The zeroing in process is a breeze. I love the fact that this product combines a red dot and a laser in a single unit—at an extremely reasonable price. I bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: Gene4cycling

customer_reviews.title: accuracy of item advertised
customer_reviews.text: WOW, a very well built product, I completely expected it to be a bit flimsy because of the price, to the contrary, it is superbly built, very sturdy, the lazer is sharp and bright, the red dot is very bright on the highest setting, when I mounted it to my firearm, both sights, the lazer and red dot was within 1/4" of being spot on the money at 30 yrds, great
customer_reviews.author: Hasiem

customer_reviews.title: Great Features At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Terrific red dot scope at a very attractive price. Considerably less money than other red dots I had considered and an added feature, a laser sight incorporated. It seems solidly built and is stable mounted. Controls easily accessed. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx0026

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy another
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much of this thing because of the price. The dot is clean & doesn't double print or echo. It tolerates recoil & holds zero. The mount is true to size & locks up nicely on my rail. The flip up lens caps are a nice touch. It's not an AimPoint but it's an awesome addition to a back up rifle
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and we'll put together.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer service. Can't say enough about that. Always very important to me. These are obviously people who are very invested in their products. The construction is top notch and if you follow the instructions very simple to set up and use. Will definitely be using AT3 for all my future AR needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Comes loose/ Cuts off
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my 9mm scorpion evo and..... Pros- zeroed with no problem. Held a zero second time out. Cons- Consistently comes loose causing you to have to constantly monitor if it’s tight on the rail...It also cut off on me twice within 200 rounds. Comes right back on though. It might be best on a .22
customer_reviews.author: Allen Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Occasionally turns off but good value
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have with this sight is that it turns off once in a while after a shot. Turns right back on when you push the button but still a bit of a hassle. Other than that, it's a great value and holds zero.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bastyr

customer_reviews.title: Great sight, great value
customer_reviews.text: The sight went on my AR very easily. Came with specific instructions on how to mount and sight in. Adjustments were easy and went smoothly. After buying it the company sent an email with further instructions and also attached a few targets that helped sight it in at different yardage. Overall I would buy it again and am very happy. Definitely would reccomend for anyone looking for a quality sight but don't want to spend several hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: The final and best addition to my rifle.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my AR, easy mount and a near perfect zero from the factory. I like the 3/4 position of my iron sights should I want to use them. I also like the additional laser sight ,it makes my original sights my third choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this based on the video reviews that I watched and the online reviews. Absolutely love this sight! Excellent quality and very easy to zero. So far, seems to hold zero and function flawlessly. Laser is an added bonus. Highly recommend! No need to buy a more expensive sight. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rate this as I just didn’t like the laser. Would like to have mounted it on my AR to try it but didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product at great price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sight, the additional Red laser is a bonus. the fit, finish and apparent quality are very good I have not shot it yet.I really like this sight.
customer_reviews.author: dow man

customer_reviews.title: Laser perfect
customer_reviews.text: This scope is dead on for my needs the red dot works well and the laser is awesome. Thank you for a solid built scope I am recommending this to anyone looking for a good red dot that may not want to spend a small fortune. Note: The red dot may not be as thick as some others but it works just fine....the laser is even better.
customer_reviews.author: NEWMAN

customer_reviews.title: Co-Witness with most flip ups.
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be easy to dial in and very accurate so far. I'm not that aggressive. So, It will take some time to find out if it's a durable as it looks. So, far I am very happy with the Red dot. Co-Witnesses well with all of the flip up backup sites I have as well. I have used the laser to cross check my laser bore site accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: NCICS

customer_reviews.title: Compact scope
customer_reviews.text: Very nice scope. Fit my AR perfectly. Zero in was easy. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with the sight. Super quick delivery. Quality and look awesome. Can’t wait to use it in the field on my Hungarian AMD 65 Laser is perfecto mundo :) addition by the way Absolutely buy!
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome red dot and laser!!!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this on my Wife's AR-15 and she loves it. Super easy to zero and so far after about 500 rounds, both the red dot and laser have held zero.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great red dot sight
customer_reviews.text: Order shipped right away and was delivered on time. Packaging was good and it came with instructions. Sighted in easy and held zero. I don't have a lot of use for the laser but it's nice to have there when I want it. The flip up caps are an added bonus, handy. Nice addition and I can't find anything to dislike, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: picky-buyer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great site, I like it better than my Vortex and the Primaryarms i have on other units, i would strongly suggest this site not just that its a bargain but its just quality...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cappelli

customer_reviews.title: Like the fact they included the scope covers
customer_reviews.text: Wow, 2 in1, incredible combo! Zero the red dot and walk the lazer in! Like the fact they included the scope covers. Just the ticket for the rimfire challenge course mounted on my 10/22.
customer_reviews.author: Yevie

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these one works good but the other one does not get bright really a bummer
customer_reviews.author: Cj War

customer_reviews.title: High quality at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Just received the scope, only have had a chance to look it over and mount it on my S&W ar15. The quality is excellent, everything is very well made and works like a charm. I highly recommend this scope.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: this one is AWESOME! Many of mine are a lot more money
customer_reviews.text: I have "SEVERAL" red/laser combos and for the money or higher,,this one is AWESOME! Many of mine are a lot more money, but I mounted this one yesterday and it was super easy to sight in, both the laser and red dot. Purchase one and you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: george a

customer_reviews.title: Perty cool with all the options
customer_reviews.text: Perty cool with all the options. Looks great and fits great. Only problem is with me is it has a red glare in the lense. But can work through it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Stinson

customer_reviews.title: solid and seems like it will last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: it seems extremely well built,solid and seems like it will last a lifetime.Very pleased I bought it.i got the bore laser and already sighted in the red dot and laser and should be going out this weekend to shoot.i can"t wait to play with it.I would recommend this great product to everyone interested in the market.great price and product.
customer_reviews.author: Mw1012

customer_reviews.title: Coe aligns,Good quality takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased I bought this just as a kinda a joke and then if it work out then Id keep it....Was I completely taken off guard with the quality of the optic. High quality the riser is perfect height. Coesights with front post. The laser is bright. took 3 rounds before it was locked in and I put 200 rounds through it and held up nice. Will be buying another one
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Red Dot Turns Off After A Few Rounds
customer_reviews.text: Great red dot and laser combo plus the optics is sturdy, however, it’ll come loose off the AR15 after a few round. The worst part is how the red dot turns off after a few rounds...that’s a huge problem in an “oh crap” situation... I don’t recommend this at all, especially for that price. Stick to brand names yall.
customer_reviews.author: Ka Yeng Vue

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: So for , I love this Red dot, it's spot on accurate. . I've run 200 rounds thrue my AR and still dead on at 30 yards.. wished I had got the green lazer, the red washes out during the day but in low light no problems... the sight seems to be well built, mounted easy and sighted in no problems... I will probably order the same sight again with the green lazer...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest laser I have used to zero and one battery runs everything. Very crisp red dot. Headed to the range shortly to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn A Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: nice solid construction. easy adjustment and good accuracy. i now have one of these on each of my rifles
customer_reviews.author: vinnd

customer_reviews.title: and I have to say that it has been great! I put it on my SKS bullpup and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this was my first Red dot sight, and I have to say that it has been great! I put it on my SKS bullpup and the extra height has made it easy to see the dot while keeping both eyes open. I am definitely going to order another one for an as yet to be built AR....
customer_reviews.author: Wylie

customer_reviews.title: Laser stops working after firing multiple rounds.
customer_reviews.text: Just zeroed the sight. No issues. Worked well! After I zeroed the laser and fires about 20 rounds of 5.56 it stopped working. I plan to return for a replacement. I love the sight. I hope this one works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great optic.
customer_reviews.text: Stable at 100 on AK. Like features, flip up covers, nice control buttons. Exactly what I was looking for. Gifted one to a friend and he raves.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Riblle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great sight, laser is accurate, can't beat the product for the price. Glad I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: zuri mapp

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Highly recommend it. M&P 15-22.....
customer_reviews.text: This being my first ever red dot to ever use I can't give it 5 stars for accuracy and brightness. Functions work great. Laser is super bright. Seems to be right on target with the red dot. Getting another AR so I will be ordering this item for that one as well
customer_reviews.author: harold W.

customer_reviews.title: The red dot isn't crisp its more like a red slash
customer_reviews.text: The red dot isn't crisp its more like a red slash.if i could rate this product less than one star i would.dont spend you're money on this red dot just get something else.
customer_reviews.author: luis marquez

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up the laser and red dot. Very accurate after that!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid, well made, well thought out piece. I can’t think of a single deficiency. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: GLK

customer_reviews.title: Sighted in easily on my M&P Sport 2
customer_reviews.text: Sighted in easily on my M&P Sport 2! Sighted it in at 50yds on a 25yd target, so hoping to take it to a different range to see how accurate it holds on 50 and 100yd targets. Looks great on the gun, and could't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: I'm wolverine

customer_reviews.title: The Red Dot was easy to set up on my AR 15
customer_reviews.text: The Red Dot was easy to set up on my AR 15. The red dot has stayed solid and does not drift. I really like the control buttons and lense caps. A really good Red Dot sight, especially for the cost. I have not set up the laser completely yet.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie Willcox

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great sight.
customer_reviews.text: What a great sight. I use it on a 300 BLK pistol and it is fast and accurate. Easy mounting and ling battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Roy F. Mccabe

customer_reviews.title: So far I love the red dot sight but not mounting or sighting ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I love the red dot sight but not mounting or sighting in till next weekend being we are having a heat wave with 105 heat index.I'm going to save this email and get back with you when it's up and running.The neat thing for you is there will be 7 other guys I hunt with will see your product next weekend.I will stay in touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, however I would love it if it would hold adjustments better. I have lined it up and balanced the optics with the laser 5 times and even still after a few days the laser and optic do not correspond.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Boy

customer_reviews.title: "Good value"
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very well made and thought out... Installed it on a pistol build, and find it perfect for that application. Controls are in good position for my left thumb, red dot adj caps also function as adjusters for Laser and dot. I found this to be a good value for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Rex G. Sistek

customer_reviews.title: Although only time will tell after additional use, the ...
customer_reviews.text: Although only time will tell after additional use, the quality of this optic is exceptional. I purchased two and both are flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: but rather annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Red dot is ok. Laser shuts off with each shot. Turns right back on, but rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyC

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted for my gun
customer_reviews.text: Great product...was able to sight my AR in at 50 yards with ease. Laser and red dot rectle are very accurate. Wind and elevation tools easy to use, great tactical scope
customer_reviews.author: Nathan lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised. Good product very pleased with all features and the price
customer_reviews.author: Don B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Turned my 300 blackout into a Pig slaying machine!
customer_reviews.author: Danoutdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Great Optic
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to sight in. This is my 4th one. 2 mounted on Smith&Wesson M&P 15-22's and 2 mounted on Foxtrot Mike AR-9 pistols. Laser is also easy to sight in. Battery life is great. Bought the first one 2 years ago and still on the same battery. Great optic for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Gave 5 star scope clear bright red dot has no star burst at any brightness level easy mount easy to zero easy to use. Laser is good in low light conditions Delivery was quick Would buy again and have recommended it thanks for a good product
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: awesome scope for the price point . . if you aren't deploying to afghanistan , this should get ya by . .
customer_reviews.author: james hartman

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works a advertised & I have not had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great sight
customer_reviews.text: Nice sight! Red dot shows up well in bright light,laser works we’ll in low light.uses the same batteries as my flashlight,light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this red dot was good. I did not keep it due to the fact that I wear bi-focals and had trouble focusing.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Impressed with the quality of the product and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Impressed with the quality of the product and the effort of the seller to make sure I was completely happy with my purchase. It functions perfectly for what I need and has held zero after many rounds... I recommend this to anyone that want's a quality site from a quality company! Thank you AT3. Your decal looks good on my Jeep as well!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Prosser

customer_reviews.title: Very well made optic
customer_reviews.text: I received this red dot very quickly. After day one of shooting, it performed perfectly. It was easy to sight in and very accurate. I have not used the laser yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McFelea

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and sight-in
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and sight-in. very accurate and easy to switch between red dot and laser. My flip up back-up sights can be used with this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hondo Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Red dot
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the money. Customer service is good also.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to zero in
customer_reviews.text: Very nice scope. Constantly putting them in the middle after less than half a box of 556. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Steel Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Had no issues. Seller was helpful. I would recommend the product and buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: stanley

product_meta.title: AT3 LEOS Red Dot Sight with Integrated Laser & Riser - 2 MOA Red Dot Scope with Flip Up Lens Caps
feature_bullets: Crisp 2 MOA Red Dot & Brilliant Red Laser with W/E Adjustment. 50K Hour Max Battery Life
Riser Mount Housing, Flip Up Lens Caps, & Tool-free Windage & Elevation Adjustments
Durable, Waterproof 6061 Aluminum Housing - Lifetime AT3 Warranty
Ideal for home defense, tactical & law enforcement, hunting, plinking, competitive shooting, or any shooting scenario where magnification is not required.
For use on sporting & hunting rifles, shotguns, air rifles, & any other weapon with a picatinny or weaver mounting rail.
